response.overview: Casa explores the relationship between the past and present. It does so through the eyes of Claudio, a 35-year-old man who, at the age of 18, immigrated to England and left behind a life that continued without him. Claudioâ€™s bittersweet reminiscing is a reminder of the appreciation one has for their roots; and with the help of his closest friends and family we traverse the abstract nature of loss, separation and evolution through time.
response.title: Casa
